title: Computer Numerical Control of Machine-Tools

author: Peter Butala, Faculty of Mechanical Engineering, University of Ljubljana

segmentation: What I'm going to show you today is a little bit of history of evolution of this technology in our lab.
And where we are now and what can be the starting point of our future collaboration, which I see quite bright, bright future.
